thread.title: Anna
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Anna

author: Anna
title: Anna
text: I will always recommend R & G Brenner to anyone who asks about where I have my taxes done. The people are very friendly and helpful. Susan is always up on all the new regulations and advises me with the information. I enjoy having my taxes done by Susan, she is like a good friend,
